# Part 1

```{r}
#create the vector
vec_1 <- c(2, 5, 9, 10, 8, 12, 1, 0)
```
```{r}
#check the vector
class(vec_1)
typeof(vec_1)
vec_1_e3 <- vec_1[3]
vec_1_e1 <- vec_1[1]
vec_1_e5to7 <- vec_1[5:7]
vec_1_char <- as.character(vec_1)
```

```{r}
#Vector 2
vec_2 <- c(town = "Santa Barbara", 
           location = "Rincon", 
           swell = "south")

class(vec_2)
length(vec_2)

vec_2_e2 <- vec_2["location"]
```
